item.title: NPC dialogue Problems needing a little bit of help!
item.dc:creator: @Jeremy368 Jeremy368
item.description:
@Jeremy368 wrote:

Ok i have read various Tuts on Npc Dialogue and i am having some problems so before i even tell you all what i have done and whats wrong i would like to everyone to try and at least point me in the right direction.

Ok I know that this bit of code tells the npc to look at case 1337 for dialogue!

} else if (NPCID == 3307) { /* Dragon Tele*/ skillX = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absX; skillY = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absY; NpcWanneTalk = 1337;
This is case 1337 i understand everything up to this point

case 1337: // Gate Keeper sendFrame200(4883, 591); sendFrame126("Dragon Slayer", 4884); sendFrame126("Lets Kick Some Dragon Ass!", 4885); sendFrame75(NpcTalkTo, 4883); sendFrame164(4882); NpcDialogueSend = true; break;
And then i went to case 40 and added “NpcDialogue == 1337” Under “if” so the npc will say case 1337 then case 1338 and so on

case 40: if (NpcDialogue == 1 || NpcDialogue == 1337 || NpcDialogue == 5 || NpcDialogue == 40 || NpcDialogue == 42 || NpcDialogue == 1001 || NpcDialogue == 1002 || NpcDialogue == 2259 || NpcDialogue == 2260 || NpcDialogue == 301 || NpcDialogue == 305 || NpcDialogue == 308 || NpcDialogue == 309 || NpcDialogue == 313 || NpcDialogue == 314 || NpcDialogue == 317 || NpcDialogue == 318 || NpcDialogue == 319 || NpcDialogue == 322 || NpcDialogue == 323 || NpcDialogue == 14600 || NpcDialogue == 14602 || NpcDialogue == 550 || NpcDialogue == 1694 || NpcDialogue == 1339) { NpcDialogue += 1; NpcDialogueSend = false; } else if (NpcDialogue == 6 || NpcDialogue == 7 || NpcDialogue == 300 || NpcDialogue == 303 || NpcDialogue == 304 || NpcDialogue == 307 || NpcDialogue == 310 || NpcDialogue == 311 || NpcDialogue == 312 || NpcDialogue == 315 || NpcDialogue == 316 || NpcDialogue == 320 || NpcDialogue == 321 || NpcDialogue == 324 || NpcDialogue == 325 || NpcDialogue == 326 || NpcDialogue == 14604) { NpcDialogue = 0; NpcDialogueSend = false; RemoveAllWindows();
And i have this for case 1338

case 1338: // Gate Keepr-Dragon Tele sendFrame171(1, 2465); sendFrame171(0, 2468); sendFrame126("Select an Option", 2460); sendFrame126("King Black Dragon!", 2461); sendFrame126("Green Dragons!", 2462); sendFrame164(2459); NpcDialogueSend = true; break;
What i am stuck on is making it so when a player selects a option they are teleported!
here is what i have tried… Under “case 9158:” I have…

} else if (NpcDialogue == 1338) { // Gate Keeper-Dragon Tele NpcDialogue = 0; NpcDialogueSend = false; sendMessage("Go kill some dragons!"); teleportToX = 2412; teleportToY = 3091;
And under “case 9157:” I have…

} else if (NpcDialogue == 1338) { // Gate Keeper-Dragon Tele NpcDialogue = 0; NpcDialogueSend = false; sendMessage("You teleport to the abyss."); teleportToX = 3350; teleportToY = 3677;

I have gotten this far on my own now i need some help from you amazing people at mopar!!!

—Update—
I suspect i did something wrong in case 40 but i am not sure

Read full topic
